name: happy-hour-over-the-brine
title: Happy Hour: Over The Brine
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• TDOT is trying to stay ahead of tomorrow’s snow by spraying salt brine on the roads before it actually starts snowing. We endorse this. [WKRN]
  • We’d like to wish a very happy birthday to Ms. Dolly Parton, who turned 65 today! We can only hope we’re still going that strong at 65. [Tennessean]
  • The Davidson County Sheriff’s Office now has a mobile booking unit at their disposal, complete with computers, finger-printing machines, mugshot machines (read: cameras) and enough cells to hold nine people. [WKRN]
  • Titans safety Michael Griffin will join Jason Babin, Chris Johnson and Marc Mariani in the Pro Bowl this year. [WSMV]
  • Fancy new wi-fi hot spot: The Tennessee State Capitol. [WZTV]

Photo by Rebecca Seung.
